Package Game.GameUtils.Entity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Enemy
    Enemy class Contains almost everything related to an enemy like spawnpoint, image, size, direction, usw
    Entity
    The Entity class is a abstract class to handle entitys.
    EntityHandler
    Handles all the entitys including the player It updates entitys when they move, it handles firing, getting hit and spawning new enemies
    Player
    The player character has two different movement modes, HP and it can fire
    Projectile
    Projectiles which are used by every other entity
    Ship
    Abstract class which extends Entity Can fire and has a Hitbox
